EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - St. Louis
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in St. Louis. See event details below:
Date: March 30, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 12:00 PM Location: EMC Corporation, Cardinals Conference Room, 600 Emerson Rd #400, St. Louis, MO 63141
{{my.Save the Date St Louis}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>.
